title: Replace BidArena logo with user-provided static asset

requirements.summary: Replace the existing BidArena logo with the user-provided image wherever the logo is rendered (header and footer at minimum).
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo image is updated to the user-provided logo and renders without broken image links.
The footer logo image is updated to the user-provided logo and renders without broken image links.
No remaining tags in the app reference the old logo path "/assets/generated/bidarena-logo.dim_512x512.png" unless the user-provided logo is intentionally placed at that same path/filename.

file_operations.description: Add the user-provided logo image as a frontend static asset by placing/copying the provided file (from the uploaded assets list, e.g., 88fc1627-70a4-428d-b7dd-d28a3e0a7e91.png) into this path so it can be referenced by the UI without using the backend.

Update all logo usages (at minimum the header and footer) to reference the new static asset path "/assets/bidarena-logo.png" instead of "/assets/generated/bidarena-logo.dim_512x512.png", ensuring there are no remaining references to the old logo path.
